channel.title: 99 News Feed
channel.description: Hey, Final question for the day. I've tried to make this myself many many times, and failed horribly. How do I make it so when one of my players achieves 99 in a skill, it says it to everyone in the game in their chat box? like how it is on runescape today, My base is a 317 PI Thank you

item.title: 99 News Feed
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

Off the top of my head, I’d create another player variable for each skill. Then I’d put code into my RefreshSkills() method. First block of code:

If player reaches 99 and variable 1 is 0
Run code
Player variable 1 is 1
End code

Read full topic
